title: Respiration in man
brief_description: Living tissue and various instruments, techniques and experiments are used to illustrate the structure of the lungs. Movements of alveoli and blood in the vessels, gas concentration relationship, transport of 02 and C02, aortic and carotid bodies, and the function of carotid bodies are also shown. No other credits available.
